text: The aspects of patriotism that hush dissent, encourage going along, and sanction comfortable distancing and compliance with what is indecent and unacceptable... those aspects are too fundamental to ignore or gloss over.
author: Bernadine Dohrn

text: We are a big country, with lots of advantages and history. We are proud to be French. We have to call on patriotism at this time... to ask for an effort in the battle against debt.
author: Francois Hollande

text: If military movies were automatically successful we'd make nothing but military movies. But seriously, patriotism is one thing that all Americans have in common.
author: Tommy Lee Jones

text: Every man who has shown the world the way to beauty, to true culture, has been a rebel, a 'universal' without patriotism, without home, who has found his people everywhere.
author: Chaim Potok

text: If you are tired of partisanship over patriotism, you need to vote for a change in direction.
author: Jennifer Granholm
